content: version a work the 8 row of chart a working the design 6 times around the leg this is one repeat when you come to start the second repeat round 9 and at the first round of all future repeats you will need to shift the last st you worked in the previous round onto your first needle and make this the first st of the round as this st is effectively not worked i have marked it in red on the chart version b work as for version a but at the beginning of the second and every following repeat you will need to work the first st of needle 1 onto needle 2 so you effectively shift into the other direction following this principle work as many repeats as you prefer to achieve the desired leg length i have worked 8 repeats 64 rounds on my sample socks heel at the beginning of the heel you will need to perform the same shift you have done for the respec- tive leg version work the heel over needle 1 only 36 sts row1 sl1 k to end row2 sl1 p to end row3 sl1 k1 repeat to end repeat row 2 and 3 until you have worked 40 row in total although this is personal preference and will depend on the height of your instep make sure you end after working a row 2 wendel page 3 turn the heel as follows row1 sl1 k1 9 times k1 ssk k1 turn row2 sl1 p3 p2tog p1 turn row3 sl1 k to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn row4 sl1 p to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat the last 2 row until you have used up all the sts on your needles ending with a row 4 and 20 sts on your needle k 10 this is the centre back of your sock and the new beginning of your rounds gusset with needle1 k 10 pick up and k 1 st in each of the slipped stitches all the way down the heel flap to the instep you should pick up half the number of sts that you have knitted row in your flap i e 20 sts for a 40 row flap m1 st in the gap between the flap and the instep sts place a stitch marker work across the instep according the row 1 of the instep chart of either version a or b place a second marker m1 in the gap between the instep and the flap pick up and k one st in each of the slipped sts up the second side of the heel flap taking care to pick up the same number as on the other side k remaining 10 sts to centre back round1 k to 2 sts before marker ssk slip marker work instep as charted slip second marker k2 decrease k to end of round round2 k to marker slip marker work instep as
